full_text: This is a recipe for completing a pair of socks from a cranked sock tube. Materials: Sock tube – cranked on a Circular Sock Machine (CSM), Contrasting yarn for heels, toes, and cuff Needles – US size 1, 1.5 or 2 … your choice depending on your knitting style. I use a US size 1.5. Regular knitting notions – tape measure, stitch markers, darning needle, scissors
name: Ravelry: Cranky Socks pattern by Mary Nielsen
